text: 1.11: Ga 2.7; Kor 1.25; 1 Te 2.4; 1 T 6.15Mba kameŋ ne guigira, ne Fhe Bakɨme na nɨɨŋgi kaman vhuueŋ vhen ki. Gu khar mba kameŋ bun nzuai. Gu bun nzuai kaman vhuueŋ khaŋ nzuai, Fhe Bakɨme ana vhava ŋaara bakɨme phorga kim, ana ŋkasŋka, ana nduara guigira fharigi. Ana nduara ndikndiga guara nɨɨŋge ma.
